name: Caramel Bars
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups light brown sugar 1 1/2 cups quick oats
steps: Cream well. Divide in half. Press 1/2 into a 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 10 minutes at 350. Melt 48 Kraft Carmel
s with 1/2 cup milk in the microwave. Put 6 oz. chocolate on baked crust. Pour melted caramel onto
chocolate chips and crust. Dab. remaining batter on top. Bake 15 min more at 350.
